name: azure-storage-blob
label: Azure Storage Blob
description: Azure Blob storage is a service that contains information for operations on block blobs, append blobs, and page blobs. This connector helps you to perform REST operations for working with blobs in the Blob service.

fields.title: Storage Account Name
fields.description: Name of the storage account from which you want to perform the automated operations.
fields.name: account_name

fields.title: Account SAS Token
fields.name: sas_token
fields.description: Account Shared Access Signature(SAS) to perform automated operations on Storage Table Service.
fields.tooltip: Account Shared Access Signature(SAS) to perform automated operations on Storage Table Service.

fields.title: Container Name
fields.name: container_name
fields.description: Specify the name of the azure container.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description:
Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not.
By default, this option is set to True.

operations.title: Put Blob
operations.description: The Put Blob operation creates a new block, page, or append blob, or updates the content of an existing block blob.

parameters.title: Blob Name
parameters.name: blob_name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the blob.
parameters.description: Specify the name of the blob to create or update.

parameters.title: Blob Type
parameters.name: blob_type
parameters.tooltip: Select the type of the blob to create block blob, page blob and append blob.
parameters.description: Select the type of the blob to create block blob, page blob and append blob.

parameters.title: Blob Data
parameters.name: blob_data
parameters.tooltip: Specify the content of the blob. For a page blob or an append blob, the content is empty.
parameters.description: Specify the content of the blob. For a page blob or an append blob, the content is empty.

operations.title: List Blob
operations.description: The List Blobs operation returns a list of the blobs under the specified container.
